author: Sam Hancock, Sam Hancock
title: 'We just want to go home': The British nationals trapped in Peru due to coronavirus
description: One woman stranded in a Cusco hostel is an NHS nurse who says she wants to get home so she can help fight pandemic, reports Sam Hancock
content: When Siân Forkan embarked on a three-month trip to South America in February, she couldnt have known that it would end with her being confined to a hostel room for 23 hours a day, with the threat of a five to 10 year prison sentence if she defied the Peruvian… [+7597 chars]
